law.catch_line: A person who violates § 5-574(a) or § 5-582 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on con...
law.text:
A person who violates § 5-574(a) or § 5-582 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to:
a fine not exceeding $1,500 for the first violation; and
a fine not exceeding $2,500 for a second or subsequent violation.
